Reference

All functions

apply_viterbi()

Viterbi algorithm.

check_controls()

Check controls

Decoding check

check_estimation()

Estimation check

check_saving()

Saving check

compute_ci()

Confidence intervals

compute_fs()

Fine-scale chunk lengths

create_visuals()

Visualization

download_data()

Data download

fit_hmm()

Fit (hierarchical) hidden Markov models to financial data

Initialisation

max_likelihood()

Optimization

parameter_names()

Parameter names

plot_ll()

Visualization of log-likelihood values

plot_sdd()

Visualization of estimated state-dependent distributions

plot_ts()

Visualize decoded time-series

predict()

Prediction

print(<fHMM_trouble>)

Print method for fHMM_trouble.

Data processing

pseudo_residuals()

Pseudo-residuals

Read .csv-file

Data simulation

trouble()

Debugging.
